title: Felix the cat: the movie
creator_credit: Tibor Hernadi, James Schenk, Christian Schneider, Don Oriolo, Animation Film Cologne and Felix the Cat Creations
brief_description: The lovable Felix the Cat is back in a full-length movie to entertain and delight a new generation of young children as well as those who grew up with this famous cartoon cat. Join Felix in an adventure full of twists and turns as he is summoned to the golden Kingdom of Oriana, where the evil Duke Zill has just escaped exile and is plotting to turn the peaceful green land of Oriana into a profitable land, but one that will be an industrial nightmare. With his magical Bag of Tricks and the help of the beautiful Princess Oriana, Felix sets out to save the Kingdom from Zill and his mechanical troops. Based on an original story by Don Oriolo. Original Felix characters designed by Joe Oriolo.
